website_summaries.verdict: Combining a strapless and minimizing bra into one smooth, seamless model, even those with larger busts see clothing fit better while getting full support.
pros: Optional straps give 4 ways to wear: strapless, halter, demi, and criss-cross
While not padded, there’s a thin lining so the bra isn't see-through
Users find the minimizer function works well, making their chest look smaller
Underwire isn’t as intrusive as in some other models
cons: Some users who ordered the correct size got a too-snug fit
The silicone strips holding the bra in place may cause skin irritation

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra ever!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my back look smooth. Stays up. Has underwires, but they don't squeeze. I can wear all my spaghetti strapped dresses now! The package includes detachable straps! LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Lalofra1Top Contributor: Women's Fashion

customer_reviews.title: Dont Think I Can Live Without This Bra!
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best bra i have ever owned, and i love VS & Fredericks I ordered the nude color is perfect color! i just tried it on and i am in love! do not want to take it off i ordered black immediately after, i am a 34DD & have never found a strapless bra that hold me up and perfect. True to size and super soft! This is a must have! i will order for both my mom and sister asap!!!
customer_reviews.author: amethyst

customer_reviews.title: best strapless bra ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg!! This is the best strapless bra ever. I am a 34DD and have been looking for a good strapless bra that provides support for a while now. This is it!! Get it, trust me, i looked at the previous reviews and I'm glad it's nothing short. I'm just so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Busayo

customer_reviews.title: Different than advertised- odd sizing too
customer_reviews.text: So confused. I bought a 34 DD and a 36 DD. The 36 was too large and the 34 was too small. Also, they were two completely different bras.
customer_reviews.author: Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Not enough grip for smaller women
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking for something to wear under tanks since I don't like my bra straps showing. The bottom band stays in place, which is fantastic, but the top of the cups kept sliding down and created a very unflattering silhouette in shirts that are form fitting. I'm not a busty woman (36B/C) - I think it would work better for a woman with larger breasts.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: This bra is amazing! after years and years i found the best
customer_reviews.text: This bra is amazing! after years and years i found the best! I was 34DD or something like that until 2010 that i had surgery and now i am 34C. Even that i was not comfortable just to think of wearing a strapless but made the decision and i am really happy i found this brand. Now i feel really free and wont worry about hiding the straps. Love it and will buy more! UPDATE: I received some questions about this bra so here you can see the pictures of the "inside" and the grip bands. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Zarate

customer_reviews.title: First supportive strapless for DDD
customer_reviews.text: I can't rave enough about this bra! This is the FIRST and ONLY strapless I have found that actually covers and supports my DDD boobs. I normally order a 34DDD but reading that the band was tight I opted for a 36DD, fits perfect. It has a grippy upper neckline and also has boning in the sides to ensure the bra keeps its shape. Wide band helps prevent back fat bulge. Under wire helps prevent too much cleavage and side boob.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B.

customer_reviews.title: fit great. But
customer_reviews.text: This bra has left me blisters! Unacceptable and dangerous. When I first got it, fit great. But, as I wore it throughout the day, the bra wire kept digging into my skin. I even clipped the hooks on the back to last ones. I'm a 34DD and was excited to find something my size. But, at the cost of burns. This has never, ever happened to me before.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Suarez

customer_reviews.title: The one star reviews are true!
customer_reviews.text: I am 34DD - the band on this is tiny, like 3 inches too short, to the point where I can't get it around me. I got out a tape measure and it measures 27 inches. My rib cage is 31 inches! In fact my actual bra size is 32E, which is hard to find, so usually get a 34DD. Having brought bras for over 35 years I know the sizing is off on these, and it's going back. I read in another review that these are a knock off as the label does not say Lilyette - sure enough my label has some numbers followed by made in El Salvador.
customer_reviews.author: Ms London

customer_reviews.title: Sizing can be off
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this bra. Tried it on and the bands barely wrap around my sides. The bra is VERY stretchy and with a couple minutes of struggling I managed to hook it on. The “cups” made my boobs look very droopy and made a noticeable indent that is easy to see with a shirt on. I ordered my normal bra size ( a 34DD) yet the band was very uncomfortable and the “cups” were to small. And being thatthere is sticky strips on the top and bottom of the bra it prevents you from hooking the clasp in front and turning the bra around. Will definitely be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: BEST BRA EVER!!! MUST BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best Ever!! I am a natural FULL 34 DD, 115 lbs. I have searched high and low for YEARS for a good strapless bra and have NEVER EVER found one until I came across this one. I literally wanted to cry when I put it on from excitement. I still can't believe I found this bra! I am in love with it, I can't wait to go shopping for strapless shirts/dresses. I am BEYOND happy with me purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: PinkGem

customer_reviews.title: The Best Strapless Bra Ever!
customer_reviews.text: 38D:I like so many others have tried a lot of strapless bras but this is by far the best one I've ever had. I love the fact that it's not padded and it stays in place. I hesitated on purchasing it because of the price but after reading the reviews, I decided to give it a try and I'm so glad I did. I would definitely recommend this bra and I plan to order another in the nude color as well.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. James

customer_reviews.title: It's REALLY true! Best strapless bra for the bountifully blessed!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST strapless bra I've ever dreamed of! Tried and true, it REALLY works! It supports my large-and-in-charge (natural) 36DDs!! No droopin' bitties here, I can wear strapless tops and dresses without my ta-ta's tickling my belly button! It also stays in place... no southernly slippage or saggy sadness. This bra ain't goin' no-where! I can't express enough how excited I am to have found this bra!! Bountifully blessed since age 11, I can finally wear cute tops/dress without the dreaded tacky bra strap insecurity. Ladies, if you were blessed with bigguns, getcha a bra or two... you can strut your stuff strapless style confidently!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: TOO AMAZING FOR WORDS !!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG...this is the most AMAZING strapless bra EVER. The bra must have been designed by the most brilliant engineer in the world to figure how to hold the big girls up, STAY IN PLACE, NOT LOOK LIKE YOU HAVE BRA OVER-HANG IN THE BACK, and not look like an old cow under off the shoulder fashions, t-shirts, or whatever. I actually have dents in my shoulders from years of wearing bras with straps. I have had this bra on all day under a t-shirt and it hasn't budged...TRULY A MIRACLE!
customer_reviews.author: FloralGal

customer_reviews.title: KNOCK OFF
customer_reviews.text: This is a knockoff bra! I have several lilyette bras and this is not the same. The tags on it do not say lilyette anywhere on the bra. The tag is not a soft material like all my lilyette bras. I can’t believe this, I will be returning this bra.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty sure that's not the case
customer_reviews.text: If this bra was designed to serve as a medieval torture device, than it deserves a 5 star review. However, based on the product description, I'm pretty sure that's not the case, so 1 star it is. Understanding that strapless bras are generally not comfortable, this is by far the most uncomfortable one I've ever worn. To make it even worse, the design and fit was entirely unflattering. The band across the top of the girls felt like it was cutting off circulation, while the cups seemed like flaps of loose fabric that were in no way fitted or smoothing. I couldn't return this bra fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: WickeyStickit

customer_reviews.title: A little bit of a let down...
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this after reading a lot of reviews that it's good for bustier girls. I wear a 36DDD, and this drops down on my chest and sits at a lower place than I would like. This results in a dent in my skin where the line of the top of the bra is on my chest, and part of my chest poofs out over top. It is also very tight under my arms/on the sides of my breasts, and digs in. This left me with red places on either side of my chest, which hurt for a couple of days. I'll have to still wear straps with it if I wear it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 34 D. Loved the way the band felt. Very comfortable however the cup size seemed a bit small and cut too low across the breast causing it to have that shelf-like appearance that does not look good under fitted shirts. Reordered a 34 DD and it was soooo much better! I will include a picture to show the difference between 34D vs 34DD. I am 5'4"/130 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: It’s not perfect for me, but it’s the best one I’ve found so far. I have natural D breasts, and gravity takes a toll as you get older. This has made it challenging for me to find a strapless bra that fits. I hate padded bras, and the strapless padded ones have a shape that just does not work for me at all. This one isn’t padded, and it’s pretty comfortable for an underwire. The cups wrinkle slightly, but I think that might improve with wear. It’s not enough to be an issue, though. I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Stayed Put.
customer_reviews.text: Best strapless bra I've ever purchased because it actually stays up. All other strapless bras I've purchased (and believe me, I have a LOT) start to fall off me. Must be my body type, but I usually avoid clothes that you have to wear a strapless bra with for this reason. This one stayed put because of the dried glue-like material that ran all the way around the top of the bra. Only downside is it has no padding. I was breastfeeding when I wore it so luckily the dress had enough padding to hide my nips when the bra didn't!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine, stayed in place, and was very flattering.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't owned or worn a strapless bra in several decades but I was in need of one so I searched and searched and finally settled on this one based on other reviews. I wore it for the first time the day it arrived. It fit perfectly. It stayed in place---which is a definite plus! And it did not cause what I call the "Uni-boob" look where it squishes your boobs to the point it looks like you have just one without any cleavage or shape. I wore it to a party and had it on for about 6-7 hours outside in the heat. It never budged. I wear a size 40D, that's what I ordered, and it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Finally a strapless bra that stays up and serves its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the reviews, I ordered this strapless bra and boy am I SO glad I did! This is the first strapless bra that has stayed in place ALL DAY LONG! I do not find myself playing twister with it to pull it up through the day. The grip is good and this bra is well made. So excited to wear with my summer outfits now. The only thing buyer needs to know is there is no padding and lining is slightly thin so if you don't want headlights to show, get pasties before wearing and going out. I absolutely LOVE this strapless! Well worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: O So Hap E

customer_reviews.title: This bra is magic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok I was skeptical about this one but OMG this bra is amazing! I'm a size 34 D but I'm very petite so my bust looks extremely large on my frame. For my sister's wedding I'm wearing a v neck bridesmaids dress. It's lovely but I felt like I was spilling out of it. I tried different camisoles and bralettes but nothing looked good with the lace neckline. I then found the minimizer bra and I am so happy I did! This bra worked miracles! The dress looks fantastic and I don't feel immodest anymore! I feel so much more comfortable in this bra! This bra is a life changer! Will definitely be purchasing more!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of the worst strapless bras I've ever own and I've purchased some fairly cheap ones in my time. The one and only time I wore this bra was to a wedding and the wire digged into me all night, the next morning I wasnt surprised to fine a nice scrach in the area it was digging. Totally my fault but I had no idea it wasnt a padded bra so it left a lot of room in my dress causing the dress to keep riding up to my neck. All in all I just wouldn't with this bra
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: It’s a knock off, not Lilyette. Do not purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is not Lilyette brand as stated. Just a generic tag and quality not like my previous Lilyette bra (same style) that i got years ago at a dept store. I wanted the same (or at least to know by a tag it was same brand although i still would have been disappointed in the lesser quality!) the photos show the one just purchased from amazon (beige) and the actual Lilyette brand (black). Doesn't fit like the lilyette brand either.
customer_reviews.author: J marion

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure, but perhaps I purchased a " second". The bra I received does not seem to be the typical quality of Lilyette. The wires in the cups stick up above the top seam, causing extreme discomfort. The boning on sides rubs underarm creating additional pain. The bra needs to be in the last hook to stay up- also uncomfortable! Since I waited so long for delivery from this seller, and needed for an occasion, I even tried making some adjustments with needle & thread. Of course, now it cannot be returned. Very disappointing- especially after reading all of the glowing reviews. IMO, keep looking & preferably go to a store & try on first.
customer_reviews.author: Still Dreamin’

customer_reviews.title: After reading the reviews I decided I would order a ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I decided I would order a 36D (which is my size). I expected it to be snug so as to hold me in place and didn't want to fidget with pulling it up in the back. I got exactly what I was looking for. I ditched a star for a problem I have encountered... I have to use the first row of clasps, and after I wore it for one day...I was constantly itching...it drove me crazy! I'm going to have to put a piece of cloth to cover the other clasps. This should be a no-brainer for whoever created it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed to find that the bra I received was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed to find that the bra I received was a knock-off; there was no brand name on the label, it just read “made in El Salvador”. There are runs in the material and nips show straight through the bra. The difference in quality between the authentic Bali bra vs the off-brand I received can be seen in the pictures posted by other reviewers. It’s seems as though we all purchased the same product but are not all getting the authentic Lilyette Bali brand bra.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to provide a review on this one. I had asked about my size in the QnA section relative to what I usually buy on VS. Little did I realize I gained a couple pounds since quarantine but let me tell you this, I LOVE IT. I'm usually a 36DD on Victoria Secrets and I got the same size. I have larger boobs compared to my torso and this held them right up. Had it been a tad bigger it would have been perfect but I think I need to just lose the few additional pounds 😉
customer_reviews.author: Aalii

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful bra
customer_reviews.text: Great support and very comfortable. It is more comfortable than my bras with straps! It also minimizes your breasts. I'm small and wear a 36D, it is great to have my breasts look smaller. I can now wear a strapless bra with confidence, I'm not worried about it falling down or my breasts falling out!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Watson

customer_reviews.title: Yes! Yes! A hundred times yes!
customer_reviews.text: Finally! A strapless bra that lifts and stays up on my droopy c-cup boobs! And comfortably! For the first time, I can wear off the shoulder and spaghetti strap tops. I ordered this in beige then, after trying it out, ordered another in black. I'm happy these bras support me at the loosest hook points so as they stretch with wear I can keep tightening them. I also like the minimizing effect they offer. As a petite rectangle body shape, my breast size is disproportionately large. I was a little worried, initially, because my chest and armpits above the bras bulged out a bit but I have found it's only noticeable under white t-shirts and white form-fitting tops.
customer_reviews.author: W. Rosenau

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I have spent 99% of my adult life searching for a strapless bra that fits. I wanted it to fit my boobs in, not fall down and not be so uncomfortable that breathing hurt. This bra is the bra I've been looking for! It stays up, fits like a dream and the back strap is thick enough to not dig in. Yes it's not padded but as a 36dd that's a good thing! It's not restrictive and fits to me as opposed to me having to mould my boobs to fit into it. Seriously, try this. There is nothing in my country (Australia) even close to this bra and it shipped here in less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: jac_lee

customer_reviews.title: Band is tight
customer_reviews.text: The cups fit well, but the band was wayyyy too small. I suspect this is to aid in the minimizing effect of the bra as well as keep it from sliding down, but it was too tight for me. I bought a bra extender, and now it is perfect. There is no padding, but you can stick some removable sports bra pads in it if you wish. Once it's on, it doesn't slide down or need adjusting, even with the extender. I ordered my normal size, 36DD. If I could do it over, I would order a sister size with a bigger band, like 38D.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Warner

customer_reviews.title: Snug in the band
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2, 34c/d in Wacoal bras and 125-130lbs. Purchased 34d and it fit fine in cup. Just felt a tad snug in the band. I just didn't want to keep a bra I'd probably want to take off after an hour of wearing. I returned it and purchased the vanity fair strapless bra on Amazon in 36c it fit much better.
customer_reviews.author: Matty Blue Eyes

customer_reviews.title: Runs way too small
customer_reviews.text: Cannot wear it and neither can my daughter. We wear the same size bra normally and have always fit more or less ok. This bar is significantly smaller. You'd have to order several sizes up, but not sure how many. I was going to return it, but I missed my window of opportunity. :(
customer_reviews.author: Ginka D. Nikolov

customer_reviews.title: Really great strapless, totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: This really is a great strapless bra. I was hesitant to buy it without trying it on in a store, but I made a guess size wise and its great. I'm bigger chested (40C) and hate padded bras or push ups that give me a weird lip on the top. This nicely held me in, totally stayed put, and made me look great under my tops. There's no padding but its thick enough to have strong support and no nipples showing. I could wear this under a very shear shirt or tank top and feel I'm well supported. I'm very happy with the purchase, probably the best strapless I've owed!
customer_reviews.author: SoCalDesigner

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bra with huge pitfall
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bra. It is the first strapless bra I’ve ever been able to feel comfortable in, and the minimizing effects gave me an incredible confidence boost. I’m a 34DD but I weigh about 115 pounds, and this is the only bra that’s ever made me feel well proportioned. However, the loop which connects the straps to the bra broke after wearing the bra regularly for a week and twice for special events. This was extremely disappointing, as I want to wear this bra all the time. Maybe mine was a fluke— would love to exchange it for a functional product if at all possible!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I've tried strapless bras before. This is the best so far. It fits as expected. It has no padding so my nippers do show. It doesn't necessarily lift but it keeps them tucked in nice and snug under cute tops or dresses. There is an underwater. The lining of the bra is like rubber to add additional stay up power. Substantial clasp power too. Wide band. Im a 36D and this is true to size. No bra is comfortable but this one works well for what necessary.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: The best strapless bra ever, great support!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is great for anyone who needs more support. I ordered a 34D and it fits great, holds up all night and super comfortable. It doesn’t give a weird pointy shape to my breasts and I love that about this bra. I always wear slightly padded bras so this is a first with no pads but it stil looks great and doesn’t make me miss padded bras at all. Only thing is I have to wear this with the last hooks (tightest fitting) and am worried it might get lose with time. Would have preferred a 32DD for this reason. But for now, I am very happy with this bra and will probably buy in beige too.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect strapless!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect strapless!!! I found this exact bra at a wal mart like 8 years ago and never was able to find it again! It’s the only strapless I feel confident that I won’t fall out of and is very comfortable! If you’re looking for push up, this is not it. If you’re looking for a much smoother and modest look then this is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bra. Yes. It’s a minimizer. But it still shows off a little cleavage. I’m 5’ 4”, 207lbs and 40DD. this is by far one of the best strapless bras I’ve ever purchased. It’s true to size so be sure to order your size. There is one flaw however.... it does fit a little tight in the arm area, which probably means I should’ve ordered a larger size. Just be mindful of this.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great strapless support for bigger cups!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bra. Was doubtful a strapless could hold me and not make me squeeze out everywhere but I was so pleased! At 40D (almost DD) strapless isn’t always the best idea but this bra made me feel supported and I forgot it was strapless. Tiny bit pinchy at the armpit is the only bad thing I have to say. Lined with silicone or rubber along the edges to help it stay put. My dress looked great and I didn’t have to show my straps!
customer_reviews.author: Rval16

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it but ultimately am returning it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it but ultimately am returning it. I am big busted and six months postpartum. The reviews on this bra swayed me to give it a shot for my sister’s upcoming wedding in which I’m wearing a dress that comes in at the shoulders. The fit is true to size and it’s incredibly comfortable, but in my particular case the strap across the top makes a line that shows in the dress I’m in. I think it would work great for a strapless dress, though. There is NO padding so things could get real nipply real quick. Mine also came with some weird black oily looking smudges under the arms. Strange.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is so comfortable and gives nice support. Some of the reviews I read complained about material bunching. I ordered a 40 D. This is not Victoria’s Secret girls... so I am ordering another but this time 40 C. That tad wee bunching is TAD WEE and meaning very little, does not show under thin shirts. I believe this will be resolved once I have the right cup size for this particular bra. Love love love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: this is a good one. I pretty much go to all lengths ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have to have a strapless bra, this is a good one. I pretty much go to all lengths to avoid having to don a strapless bra, but have now found myself stuck with a spaghetti strap bridesmaid dress at the hands of some cruel, small-chested bridesmaids who snuck back to the bridal store without me. I'm a 36DD and am quite finicky about things staying in place. I've gone through tons of strapless bras in dressing rooms to no avail, but am pleased to see this one staying in place for more than 2 minutes at a time. Also, fits true to normal sizing.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: casual comfort
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bra. I wasn't sure how it would be under a shirt but it's fine. Sometimes you see the little line across the top, but it's worth it not to have straps digging into your shoulders! The cup is soft, not padded, as others have noted. There is an underwire which is not so great for slouching (I found out the hard way). Overall, it's well made, sturdy, and I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Jump

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true.
customer_reviews.text: I hate trying on bras. Especially strapless. Typically, I need to try on at least 20 bras in a department store to find ONE that fits. Since I buy everything on Amazon these days, I figured, why not read some reviews and try buying a bra on Amazon. I did not have high expectations and definitely expected to return this bra. BUT - IT IS PERFECT. Comfortable, supportive and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Carla M.

customer_reviews.title: BEST STRAPLESS BRA EVER!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love and telling everyone about this bra because HOLY CRAP!!!!!!!! I have gone through so many strapless bras because they all slide down and I have to keep adjusting. Then I would try going a size down and then my rolls are apparent because it’s tooo tight lol!! This bra hugs your chest And back beautifully!!!!!!! I’ll never buy a different brand ever again!!!!!!!!! Since putting it on I haven’t had to adjust it once. Where has this been all of my life?!
customer_reviews.author: Kaeleigh kulko

customer_reviews.title: Eh, still performs like a standard strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: From the reviews I was expecting miracles but this thing still smashes you down so your chest looks bad and saggy in strapless tops and doesn't feel like it will stay up any better than normal. I just wore my normal bra, pinned my strapless maxi to it and wore a bolero cardigan to cover the straps. Looked 1000% better and stayed put.
customer_reviews.author: Techbrarian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Not as comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! I just got this today. I decided to wear it b/c I just bought a strapless shirt recently & was itching to wear the actual outfit. I was also looking forward to wearing this smooth, comfortable, minimizer of a strapless bra (according to other reviews this is the best strapless bra ever!). But instead of comfort, I couldn’t wait to take it off. The wires on the side of the bra has given me welts (from being too tight? I ordered my true bra size. IDK.) & the threading has come undone (probably from trying to pull the bra up into place once hooking it)!!! Absolutely ridiculous! I’ve attached pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend this bra for your strapless needs
customer_reviews.text: Ooooh my goodness, the reviews are not lying. This is an actual comfy strapless bra that doesn't move or have other problems. I was apparently between sizes and it was digging in just a bit at the top of my boobs. As not latching the top two hooks fixed that issue, I decided to try ordering a bra extender for exactly one more row of hooks. Worked perfectly. I ordered my normal bra size. I think one band size up would have been too big, hence the extender instead of an exchange. Highly, highly recommend this bra for your strapless needs.
customer_reviews.author: Gold

customer_reviews.title: Great price perfectly fit bra
customer_reviews.text: The perfect fit bra...at reasonable prices. Tried a lot of high end bra at macy's...but all are padded..I got this non padded minimizer and happy that i purchased ..I wear 34dd cup but since this bra is under wired I baught 36dd for better comfort.. A real good deal around 20$..will buy a 34dd too..It has straps which are thin and act as regular minimizer as well with straps on..another good thing is it has wide side straps which control bulges..
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I don’t see why this has such high reviews. The wire in this bra gave me scars on my chest from stabbing me and was very uncomfortable and painful from wearing it from one day. I usually wear a 34D so I ordered 34D. The bra is also super thin so my nipples were visible through my clothing (embarassing) and I constantly had to lift up the bra because it kept falling (even though the wires were so tight up against my body that they scabbed my skin). The worst bra I’ve ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: derpy_psyduck_cards

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic support for the girls!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic support! As a busty girl, a strapless bra sounds counterintuitive to me. But this bra gets the job done. I’m normally between 38 D/40 D, depending on the brand. I ordered a 40 D and it’s a little snug, but not tight. More just great support. It’ll probably open up a little bit as it gets worn, but I’m thrilled with the support and control. Also, the band is thick enough that there’s no side effects.
customer_reviews.author: Crystaline

customer_reviews.title: Great strapless bra for larger bustlines
customer_reviews.text: This is the best strapless bra I have ever purchased! I’m typically a size 36 C/D but I went for the 36 DD size in this bra for more coverage and it works great. It’s snug without being too tight and lifting. The only tiny critique I would say is that the underwire rests couple cms below my bustline and will not sit under under it (like a regular underwired bra) no matter how much I tug and pull it up. But that doesn’t make it uncomfortable in any form and neither does it peek through tight clothing. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: aashenoy

customer_reviews.title: WAY too small
customer_reviews.text: Bra was way too small. I added a bra detention and it still would barely close. I ordered a 42DD when I wear a 40DD just to be safe and it for like a c cup. The bra itself was very soft and I do like the idea of the cups not having alot of padding because strapless bras are tricking with out all the extra fabric but it simple was not a good fit. Smaller chested people might not have this issue but I would for sure say size way up!
customer_reviews.author: Channa

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this bra
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bra, the fit was perfect and it really stays on. HOWEVER, like what the other reviewers said, after just a few hours of wearing them, I got bumps all over my back, similar to burn marks. They were itchy and stung. Thought maybe it'll be the fine the second time, but I wore it for 2 hours and there were new bumps along my back. Sadly, I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jdq

customer_reviews.title: This is a life changer.
customer_reviews.text: If you thought about getting this bra? Get it! I mean wow! I’m normally 40D to 42D in bras and I went with the 42D in this. And I’m glad I did. The fit is amazing. I’m actually wearing right now. The quality is very well. Holds up the girls. After this review I’m buying the black one. I live in Florida and I wear a lot of off the shoulder dresses and tops so I found my holy grail. I’m throwing away all my other strapless bras. And stick ons. Aleluya Amén!
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra J.

customer_reviews.title: marked wrong and way too small..
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived today and I wear a 38C and the band size on this bra measures just barely 30 inches on the largest hook adjustment. Needless to say its going back and I will try again, because it appears to be well made and has great reviews. Of course its more expensive now than when I first ordered it, but I will try again. If the new one is the correct size, I will adjust the review. If you order this bra, make sure you try it immediately so you can return it if you get one like mine lol.
customer_reviews.author: karyn

customer_reviews.title: I tried so many strapless bras over the years...  This one is a gem (for my DD size).
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased my third one of these. My size 36 feels too tight with the ten pounds I gained. 38 is great, but I had shoulder surgery and must do the hook in front and twist thing so I bought a 40 as I will be in really hot weather for 5 days - and need two, so ordered the larger size just so it would be easier. With my regular bras I always buy ones where the cups are seamed (and pointy-ish rather than smooth & round) as they make my chest look smaller. This is a very "flattening" bra, but that works for strapless with my large breasts.
customer_reviews.author: Zoomball2

customer_reviews.title: This bra will change your life
customer_reviews.text: This bra is AMAZING! I am a size 36 DD but after reading the reviews, I purchased one size up and it fits perfectly. My large bust has always made buying a strapless bra difficult as they typically do not provide the support I need and are uncomfortable but this bra is perfect! I love that it is a minimizer also, I didn’t know what that was until I saw this one and it has changed the game for me. I want to buy one in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Tesswolfe90

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time reading reviews for strapless bras. This one seemed to be the most satisfying to people with my size. 38D. I bought it for a wedding that was postponed because of pandemic so I haven't worn it more than a few minutes. But right off the bat I can tell it's better than any I've ever had before. I might buy another in a different color just to have.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret L Purcell

customer_reviews.title: This could be a good bra but it fit more like a tourniquet
customer_reviews.text: This could be a good bra but it fit more like a tourniquet. 34DD is not true to size. I wish I could figure out what size I'd be. If it fit it probably would be a great strapless. Soft material. Felt like I was going to die getting it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Not for saggier boobs
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews I thought this would be perfect for staying up without giving the ridiculous bulge that padded bras give. This bra might be good for very perky breasts but if you have saggier breastfed boobs I would not recommend it pushes the boobs down and digs in making them look saggier and a visible indent in through clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful For Big Chests
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 40DD and I must say, I was very impressed with how well it held up. I do have to pull it up a couple times throughout the day but not like others where I was doing it ever 25 minutes. Your nips will show through but you can put on pasties or a foam cup from a sports bra in to help with that. I do like how thin the fabric is because my boobs sweat a lot I don't want to feel like I'm under an armor plate.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: This is the first bra I have ever had to clip in front and spin around. Three clips on the band do not work well. If you get two, one slips out when working on the other one. YES it minimizes but the side “bones” stick right in my arm pits. The underwire leaves marks on my skin. Is a bra that you know you’re wearing. Disappointed because I have other Lilyette and I cannot even tell that they are on.
customer_reviews.author: J.Appel

customer_reviews.title: Soft non-padded cups FTW!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this bra better is if it came in a 42B! Because I wear an unusual size, I can’t wear most strapless bras because the cups are always formed and a C cup is way too big for me. I have a Wacoal strapless bra that has soft cups like this and it’s amazing but it’s also more than twice the price of this bra. I’m really pleased with how comfortable and supportive the Lilyette bra is and plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: lblong

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit full upper cut women
customer_reviews.text: If you have a full upper breast, this is not the bra for you. On the upper band, it squeezes you flat to the chest wall, causing flesh to pop out the top or out the side armpit (it'll go the path of least resistance. Not a good look and sending it back. For smaller cup sizes (guessing a B or less), this might work well. Looked well constructed, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robin McGann

customer_reviews.title: Band size runs small but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: This bra is overall well-designed and does what it's supposed to do. However IMO it runs small. I wear a 34DD in most brands (Warner, Natori, etc.) and in this bra, the 34DD is painfully tight. I decided to add an extender (which I already had on hand) rather than exchange and that seems to work well so far. I'd just consider ordering up a band size.
customer_reviews.author: TeamMed

customer_reviews.title: Best strapless bra for bigger chested ladies
customer_reviews.text: I feel like my search is finally over! I have a smaller waste with a double d chest and I am very self conscious about my larger boobs. I have felt like I can't wear clothes and certain styles because of them. This bra has literally changed all of that for me! Not only does it minimize my chest but it doesn't make me look like I have a uniboob. It is a great strapless bra as well and I can wear so SO many clothes that I never could pull off before. I have actually gotten questions and compliments on this bra! It is a life changer!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice bra but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this bra, it minimizes the breast and fits great. The only problem with this bra is marks/cuts my breast leaving red marks, and later scars as seen in the pics. For this reason I rate it 2 stars. Can't use it as much as I would like. Maybe I'll try one size up, see if it still leaves marks/bruises.
customer_reviews.author: Masdas

customer_reviews.title: Nice price
customer_reviews.text: Good price for the product. This is well made, fits true to size and nice fabric. The only piece I would say is a bit uncomfortable is the scrunch of material in the front because you cannot wear it with a smooth summer top, the scrunch shows. I am also not a fan of underwire but otherwise it is a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ralfie

customer_reviews.title: It works for large breasts!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This bra actually works and is comfortable! This bra holds up my natural 38DD's without sofferrcating me or causing me discomfort. This is the first time in my life I don't have to resort to sagging breasts so I join the rest of the world in wearing something strapless. I have placed my order for more!!
customer_reviews.author: Blessings

customer_reviews.title: Love Love - great for all day wear - dress or casual
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is amazing. I bought it because I can't wear bras with straps due to migraine tension. I'm a D cup and haven't worn a stapless bra in many years so I wasn't expecting much. You can wear this all day comfortable and there is no jiggle of your bits! It holds them tightly, but not uncomfortable and doesn't cut a line across top like a bandeau bra. It minimizes without making your chest look flat. I'm ordering another one today.
customer_reviews.author: hellohu

customer_reviews.title: Do it!!! Hit the add to cart button!
customer_reviews.text: My review is kinda like everyone else’s... I ordered My usual size 38D and strap and cup both fit great. I have NEVER found a strapless bra that I like (I’ve probably bought like 40) and I have To look no further. Seriously... get it!!! Lift is amazing. It is so secure and seamless. I think The minimizing is my favorite part. I am Always trying to find ways to make them look “smaller” which is why I love My sports bras so much. This bra is everything!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney T.

customer_reviews.title: All around pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a 38F and strapless bras are hard to find. Usually the underwire or the boning is digging into my sides but this bra is really comfortable and does offer a bit of support. I only gave it 4 stars because it does "squeak" when I move my arms, and that's a bit awkward. Maybe it'll make less sound when it breaks in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find great price perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is the best strapless bra I’ve found. After having trouble finding one I ordered this as a backup but loved it so much more than the other more expensive bras. I have larger breasts so my bras work and this one didn’t disappoint. Never felt like I needed to keep pulling it up it doesn’t gape at the top and looks great under many different dress/shirts I always shy away from because I hate strapless bras. This one is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Best Bandeau Bra
customer_reviews.text: Wow I’m extremely impressed! I have been looking for a bandeau type bra for what feels like the longest time. I tried on multiple ones at various stores and found nothing. I never thought to buy a bra online because I wanted to try it on first, but I have an event coming up and have to have a bandeau bra. I should mention that I am a 32D which makes things trickier. This bra is everything I wanted/needed and more! The fit is perfect and holds my 32D size perfect. I will buy this bra in every color they have!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing support and minimization
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 34DDD and I got the 36DD for the equivalent - does an amazing job lifting and minimizing! I’m not looking to have torpedo boobs and this totally gave me a minimized looking chest size. Looks totally fine under my clothes and lifted at the same time. This is a must have for all women. Cons: The only thing is one out of the four bras the wires dig into your side - I don’t think this is the case with all of them just some! The other 3 bras I can wear all day no problem with wires etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kay D.

customer_reviews.title: I actually danced the night away at a wedding reception (@ 8 hours) and it was still pretty comfortable. I was so surprisingly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 42DD. I had given up hope on finding any type of strapless bra that 1) Provided any shread of support, and 2) Didn't try to puncture my internal organs with its underwire. I read the reviews on this bra and took a chance. It felt very secure on and held the girls in place with minimal jiggle and without butchering me. I actually danced the night away at a wedding reception (@ 8 hours) and it was still pretty comfortable. I was so surprisingly satisfied, I'm buying another one in a different color. This bra is definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kaybee

customer_reviews.title: This is truly the best strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the best strapless bra. I always avoid outfits that require a strapless bra because I had never found a bra that would hold up my breast properly or that was comfortable enough. Although just slightly tighter around the band than I would have liked, this is the best bra! I wore it from 12:30p-9p and didn't have to pull it up once. I am a size 34DD and never thought I would be able to say I was happy and comfortable in a strapless bra.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Nice strapless bra except the side wires are PAINFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this strapless bra until I had worn it for about 30min. Size 36D, the underwire sides (under arm) rubbed red and painful spots that make this bra unwearable, for me. I would like to return it, but I wore it and removed the tags because of my initial impression. Other than that, it is supportive and the fabric is nice quality. I recommend that you where it around the house, doing some activity that requires upper body movement, for at least 30min, before removing the tags, to make sure that you don't have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Best bra I have ever owned to this day!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best strapless bra I have ever owned. I have about 4 of them now because I wear them all summer and wear them out. I love this because it is a minimizer and does not add bulk to my chest. I am large chested so certain things, especially strapless or summery things, are very challenging for me. This is the first bra that allows me to wear strapless summery things! I even end up wearing it under longer sleeved shirts because the black one can show if the shirt is low cut, kind of like I am wearing an undershirt or a bandeau. This is very tight, but I love the feeling of the support, personally.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Cenicola

customer_reviews.title: Best Strapless Bra
customer_reviews.text: This is the best strapless bra I’ve ever owned. Hands down. I’m a 34 D, not too big not too small, but unfortunately my size doesn’t allow me to go braless comfortably. I’ve avoided anything that requires a strapless bra because I’ve always had to yank they up throughout the day which is a huge pain. With this bra, the top lining grips the skin comfortably so I no longer have to keep readjusting. My only issue is it kind of stabs your armpit if you wear it too high up, but other than that no complaints! BE AWARE NIPPLES CAN AND WILL AHOW THROUGH! But I don’t care!!!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I could wear a strapless bra
customer_reviews.text: I have avoided buying shirts/dresses that need a strapless bra because I couldn't find one that was comfortable. This bra is awesome! It's soooo comfy and keeps everything in its place. I can wear it all day without movement or discomfort. Very soft material. Good price . The only minus is the straps. When I use them, they fall out of the loops and one has slightly shredded the loop.
customer_reviews.author: Mic5

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I wear a 38dd, but it wasn't available so I selected its sister size, 40d. The band is slightly bigger but it is still close enough where it holds the "girls" up and doesn't leave rolls, which would've happened if I selected the sister size down (36ddd). There is glueish strip inside to keep the bra in place, same as the ones in shapewear shorts that prevent it from riding up or rolling down. On me it appears to fit like a minimizer bra, which is what I really want. If you're busty, choose this bra!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda

customer_reviews.title: Cups are ill fitting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a 36DD and the band fits great! There’s no bulging, there are thick silicon grips, the material is silky & smooth, etc. However, the cup size is terribly off. The cup size fits more like a C cup or small D cup. It flatten my chest down and was not flattering. Will try to return this.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Diana

customer_reviews.title: This is probably one of the best strapless bras I've tried so far
customer_reviews.text: This is probably one of the best strapless bras I've tried so far. I have DD's (they may even be bigger as I haven't been properly fitted in a while), and I'm currently almost six months pregnant, but this bra was comfortable, actually fit over my boobs, and even though I've only worn it once I didn't have any major slipping or sagging issues. I'm going to wear it to a wedding in a week in 90+ degree Tennessee weather, so that will be the ultimate test! But so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: TTank9288

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder Saver
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a strapless bra like this. If this bra fits, you’re gonna love the way it gives your shoulders a break from balling around your tatas. The only draw back is the top of the cup does a slight press down making a slight weird shelf appearance. I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill G

customer_reviews.title: Size up on band size
customer_reviews.text: I am a 36d and I needed a strapless that holds me in securely and stays put! The minimizer is amazing, literally made my d look like i have a b cup. The bra is comfortable for a strapless. It's not the most comfortable bra for every day wear but for a strapless it's truly great. Just size up on the band and you will be fine. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: #amazonfan

customer_reviews.title: Not for busty girls! Not supportive.
customer_reviews.text: For reference I’m a 36 DDD. I ordered a 36 DD. My boobs fit fine inside the cup. I don’t think any of this had to do with size. Also, not pink beige. Definitely just beige. Why it didn’t work: 1. Pressed into your skin and created a muffin top. 2. Because of the material, not very good support. They hang low. Another strapless bra I tried from Amazon did not do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Life changing. It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! As a girl with a small waist and big bust (34DD) it’s always been difficult figuring out a strapless bra - often using a too small strapless covered by a bandeau... this bra is PERFECT! Life changing. True to size. Minimizer. I’ll be buying lots of off the shoulder tops for the summer just so i can wear this bra. Can’t say enough about it
customer_reviews.author: MWilliams49

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I loooooved this bra the first time i wore it. So much that I bought a second one. And then the underwire pokers through the material on the very next time I had it on!! I'm just soooooo disappointed 😔. I thought I had finally found a strapless bra that would stay up, it does stay up perfectly by the way. I just wish it would have lasted longer. Totally ruined my dinner date because I was so uncomfortable! I tried adding a piece of fabric to cover the wire but it did not work. So I threw it in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great support and perfect for bigger busted women who want to wear strapless or spaghetti strap styles
customer_reviews.text: Great bra. I wear this a lot! It eliminates the discomfort I get from wearing bras with ahoulder straps that dig into my shoulders and leave marks. It's perfect to wear with strappy tops and dresses. It minimizes well. It stays on and gives me excellent support for a strapless bra - heck, even for a normal bra. I wish I had like 4 of these!
customer_reviews.author: EmVeeJay

customer_reviews.title: Not like the other one I bought
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same strapless bra in nude and loved it so much I decided to get the black one. I was so sad when I tried it on, it fit but it bunches up! Not smooth at all. See the difference in the pictures. The material even feels different. Definitely not the same quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lupita

customer_reviews.title: If this product is a copy
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT Lilyette by Bali. Labeled fraily stating size and made in El Salvador. I am a longtime Bali Lilyette customer and I believe this is a knick-off!!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Powers

customer_reviews.title: In love with this bra!
customer_reviews.text: This bra is amazing!!!!! I have been on the hunt for the a fantastic bra. I wear a d to dd, depending on the bra. This is serious the most comfortable bra I have ever bought. It's so soft, it doesn't feel tight, the wires aren't digging, and I did some jumping jacks just to test it. It did not move!!! I absolutely love that the elastic is on top of the band! I'm in love!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Size up (unless I've grown!)
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 36C but this was tight so I should have ordered a 38C. It seems to be good quality and I don't think it will fall down. I like the double layer of fabric in the cup area which was a good fit but I need a little more padding to disguise the nipples in a white top.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy J.

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTLEY IN LOVE WITH THIS BRA
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTLEY IN LOVE WITH THIS BRA. I have a big bust so finding a strapless bra that would hold them up has always been a struggle. I saw the excellent reviews on this bra and decided to purchase. Probably the best purchase I've made. Depending on bra, I usually wear a 36D or 38D. On this bra, i bought a 38D and it fit perfectly. I love that it's not padded and it kind of reduces the size of my chest, which is a plus. Don't have anything negative to say about this bra, absolutely love it. Thanks to this bra, I can now shop for any off-the-shoulder shirts/dresses.
customer_reviews.author: mgnz

customer_reviews.title: Good Bra- But not Bali
customer_reviews.text: I give this product 4 stars just for the fact that this bra is not manufactured by Bali. It looks exactly like a bra that is made by them but it's not. When you get the bra it says Lilyette on it, but there are no tags that say the brand on it anywhere. But if you are looking for a good strapless bra, I recommend this. I will update after my best friends wedding in August with how it "holds up" ;) which is the main purpose why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

product_meta.title: Lilyette by Bali Women's #939 Tailored Minimizer Bra
feature_bullets: Sweetheart-neck minimizer bra featuring convertible/removable/adjustable straps. Tactel Nylon
Converts to halter, crisscross and demi
Minimizes bustline up to 1.5" in this strapless bra
Detachable adjustable straps ; Wide band with invisible boning ; Silicone gripper at interior sides to prevent slipping
Customize the fit with back adjustable stretch straps ; Molded, lined minimizer underwire is free of padding and support panels.
